summary: This mod basically allows the Blades gear (Armour, Boots, Gauntlets, Helmet & Shield) to use the steel smithing perk, giving you a bonus to the tempering.
descriptionHtml:
This mod basically allows the Blades gear (Armour, Boots, Gauntlets, Helmet & Shield) to use the steel smithing perk, giving you a bonus to the tempering.I couldn\'t find any mod including the Blades gear so I decided to do one myself.

This is my first mod so please be kind :)

I\'m also working on a few more tweeks, but if there\'s anything specific you wanted please let me know.
author: orangemark
